readable.title: 3218480482_66af7587c8
readable.content: A basketball player dribbles the ball while another blocks him and an official looks on . A basketball player in a whit outfit is dribbling the ball around a player in a red outfit as the referee looks on . A Miami basketball player dribbles by an Arizona State player . A referee watches two basketball players playing basketball . The guard drives towards the basket during a college basketball game .
